== Kalamassery (M) (803289) ==

Kalamassery (M) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 27 sq. km. and harbouring 17844 households with total population of 71038 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 235 km. Male population is 35331 and female population is 35707. Scheduled Caste population is 5630 and Scheduled Tribes population is 384. Census Location Code of the town is 803289<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 8 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 8 km. Railway station is at Kalamassery at a distance of 0 km.
